abstract_problem:
An enterprise IT solutions provider is optimizing its service delivery portfolio to better align with the evolving needs of its diverse client base. The central task is to curate a strategic selection of technical support modules,standardized problem-solving protocols,that can be deployed across the organization's service infrastructure. Management aims to construct a robust support framework that guarantees every unique client requirement is met with sufficient expertise, all while keeping the overhead of maintaining these active support modules within a tight budget.

The operational dynamics are complex: each support module comes with a specific deployment cost but offers varying degrees of effectiveness in addressing different client needs. Furthermore, client requirements are not binary; they have specific thresholds of satisfaction that must be cumulatively met by the combined capabilities of the deployed modules. Therefore, the decision-making process must navigate a multidimensional landscape to identify the most cost-efficient combination of modules. The goal is to ensure that the aggregate problem-solving power of the selected portfolio meets or exceeds the minimum service levels demanded by every client requirement, thereby delivering a comprehensive support solution without unnecessary expenditure.

cases.description:
Technical support cases information with columns: case_id, case_name, deployment_cost, original_var_name, description. Data format: | case_id | case_name | deployment_cost | original_var_name | description |
|---|---|---|---|---|
| C001 | Technical_Support_Case_C001 | 1 | x1 | Technical support case C001 |
| C002 | Technical_Support_Case_C002 | 2 | x2 | Technical support case C002 |
| ... | ... | ... | ... | ... |

requirements.description:
Customer requirements information with columns: requirement_id, requirement_name, coverage_threshold, original_constr_name, description. Data format: | requirement_id | requirement_name | coverage_threshold | original_constr_name | description |
|---|---|---|---|---|
| R000001 | Customer_Requirement_1 | 22 | c1 | Customer requirement 1 |
| R000002 | Customer_Requirement_2 | 3 | c2 | Customer requirement 2 |
| ... | ... | ... | ... | ... |

coverage.description:
Coverage relationships information with columns: case_id, requirement_id, coverage_value. Data format: | case_id | requirement_id | coverage_value |
|---|---|---|
| C001 | R000001 | 3 |
| C001 | R000002 | 2 |
| ... | ... | ... |

parameter.description:
System parameters in key-value format (no header). First column contains parameter names, second column contains values. Data format: | parameter_name | parameter_value |
|---|---|
| num_cases | 24 |
| num_requirements | 7534 |
| ... | ... |
